name: The 111th Soul
description: Embark on a touching and creepy journey about sacrifice and how sometimes a person pays for the sins of another
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or Radeon with at least 256mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i3 530 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550 TI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
